edu.ncsu.csc316.wordcloud.manager

Class WordCloudManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.ncsu.csc316.wordcloud.manager.WordCloudManager

  • public class WordCloudManager
extends java.lang.Object
    The WordCloudManager processes input from txt files and generates a word cloud based on the frequencies of the words that appear in the input file. Optionally, the program accepts an input txt file that contains filter words that should be excluded from the frequency analysis.
    Author:
    Andrew Shon, Bilal Mohamad

      Constructs a new Word Cloud manager with the given input txt file and input filter file (See UC1)

      • WordCloudManager

        public WordCloudManager(java.lang.String pathToText,
                        java.lang.String pathToFilter)
                 throws java.io.FileNotFoundException
        Constructs a new Word Cloud manager with the given input txt file and input filter file (See UC1)
        Parameters:
        pathToText - - the path to the input text file

        Throws:
        java.io.FileNotFoundException - if either file does not exist

      • WordCloudManager

        public WordCloudManager(java.lang.String pathToText)
                 throws java.io.FileNotFoundException
        Constructs a new Word Cloud manager with the given input txt file. No filter file is used. (See UC1)
        Parameters:
        pathToText - path to input file
        Throws:
        java.io.FileNotFoundException - throws exception for file faulties

    • Method Detail

      • getFrequencyOfWord

        public java.lang.String getFrequencyOfWord(java.lang.String word)
        Returns a frequency report for a given word. The frequency report is in the format: "The word (w) is contained in the text X times." (See UC2)
        Parameters:
        word - - the word for which to return the frequency
        Returns:
        the frequency report

      • getTopWordsReport

        public java.lang.String getTopWordsReport(int numberOfWords)
        Returns a report of the top X most frequent words. (See UC3)
        Parameters:
        numberOfWords - - the number of words to include in the report
        Returns:
        the report of the top X most frequent words in the input text

      • outputWordCloud

        public void outputWordCloud(int num)
                     throws java.io.IOException
        Sorts a map for values and outputs into html in output folder
        Parameters:
        num - number of values to display
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - exception for I/O
